reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, cuddly, and comfortable, appreciating its true white color and pretty appearance.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars very soft, pretty and comfy
items.body: I love this sweater. The white is so white, it is perfect. The sweater is so soft and comfortable, and is the perfect thickness so that it's warm but not too warm. It is a great value for the price. It did come shrink-wrapped with a bit of a chemical smell. I just put it in the dryer on low with a wet washcloth for a few minutes, and it helped. I haven't washed it yet because it says to wash it with detergent for wool or silk, and I don't have any. I am a bit concerned about that and will update if anything goes wrong when washing. As of right now, I'd order this again in a second. Read more
items.author: HoosierVol

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars STAPLE SWEATER
items.body: This sweater is SO good!! Itâ€™s such great quality for an affordable price! I will definitely be buying more colors. I canâ€™t explain how soft and cozy this really is. I usually wear a small but decided to size up to a medium and it fits great. I could do either size but Iâ€™d say a medium if you want it more oversized. The red is even more vibrant in person, the picture doesnâ€™t do it justice. You need this in your closet! Read more
items.author: Lauren

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and cute!

Iâ€™ve gotten multiple because Iâ€™m terrible at taking care of this top. For me, the feathered texture is a huge hit but has made it harder for me to clean. Thatâ€™s a me problem. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars sizing up is the way to stay cozy!
items.body: love love love this sweater! iâ€™m usually a size small but sized this up to a medium for an oversized and cozy feel! the material is really soft and isnâ€™t itchy at all or anything like that. it kept me warm for my full day trip to nyc while it was 50-65 degrees throughout the day! i highly recommend!ðŸ¤ Read more

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as shown in the photo
items.body: Doesn't look like the picture. It's not white, beige at best, far from white. Sleeves are not loose fitting. Not worth the purchase Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best
items.body: The sweater is perfect. It is sooo soft and comfy. Itâ€™s not necessarily oversized, itâ€™s jut not fitted but it is loose and comfortable. Sleeves come down past my thumb and length comes down to my mid but Itâ€™s the sweater you are gonna want in many colors. Once itâ€™s on, you are not gonna want to take it off. Itâ€™s not thick or thin.. just the perfect in between and washes a dries well so itâ€™s very durable. Read more

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not long enough

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy Blue,small, Red,small, White,medium, White,large, Navy Blue,large, Red,largr, Navy Blue,medium, White,x-large, White-black Stripes, Large, Green,medium, Green,small, Red,medium, White,small, White-black Stripes, Medium. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
